# [Interview #1153: Calamity-Chicago, Entry #25](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1153#25)

#### Question

So, what is the actual Firefight, Megan’s opposite, what’s their weakness?

#### Brandon Sanderson

I’m not going to tell you. That’s a RAFO.
